name: Piggy Panic
description:
Piggy Panic is a fun rage game. You take the role of a farmer who has to herd his pigs into a pen. While it starts easy with only 1 slow pig, they gradually get faster and faster and there is more and more of them. Enjoy!

Includes:

  • 5 Levels
  • Cool music
  • A speedrun mode
  • Decent graphics
  • Pigs!

This game runs surprisingly well I found.
